title: Task 1: Describe visual or contextual characteristic of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately describe a visual characteristic of the Vietnam Memorial.
Response accurately describes at least one visual characteristic of the Vietnam Memorial.

title: Task 2: Describes a contextual element of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately the specific physical placement of the Vietnam Memorial.
Response accurately describes the specific physical placement of the Vietnam Memorial.

title: Task 3: Explains how context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content and/or function.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use visual and/or contextual evidence to explain how Maya Lin’s design of the memorial relates to her ideas about the effect of the Vietnam War on the American people.
Accurately uses ONE example of visual and/or contextual evidence to explain how Maya Lin’s design of the memorial relates to her ideas about the effect of the Vietnam War on the American people.
Accurately uses TWO examples of visual and/or contextual evidence to explain how Maya Lin’s design of the memorial relates to her ideas about the effect of the Vietnam War on the American people.

title: Task 4: Explain how an art historical interpretation of a work of art is derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, or meaning.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use specific contextual evidence to explain how the memorial was controversial at the time it was created.
Response accurately uses specific contextual evidence to explain how the memorial was controversial at the time it was created.
